title: Can't login while my friend can
body: Eey guys . I know the client is under maintaince in euw , but for some reason my friend can login and play normal games, but whenever I try to login it says " did not receive any response from  the server" Is there any reason why he can login and I can't ( this all started this morning normally leauge works fine )

replies.body:
And you're posting on the OCE boards?

I can still help, however. First, wait until maintenance is complete for the EUW servers and then try again. Just because one person can sign in, doesn't mean everyone can.

If you're still having troubles after that, tell me your OS and ISP.
